There were no other sightings in Valdosta on or around December 27th 1995
Summary: A white or silver object huverring near I-75.
divs: sighting detailswe were traveling to florida for family vacation. we were either near the florida\ga state line on i-75 or just crossing into florida. as i was bored and looking out the window of our vehicle, i spotted the object as we were in transit. it remained still, in one place and did not move as long as i could see it. as we traveled further, within minutes it obviously went out of site.
